Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • chcalpar - Modify calibration keyword values.
  • ckwfoc @ FOC calibration parameters (p-set).
  • ckwfos @ FOS calibration parameters (p-set).
  • ckwhrs @ HRS calibration parameters (p-set).
  • ckwhsp @ HSP calibration parameters (p-set).
  • ckwwfpc @ WFPC calibration parameters (p-set).
  • ckwwfp2 @ WFPC-2 calibration parameters (p-set).
  • fwplot - Plot calibrated flux versus wavelength.
  • getcal - Populate a pset with calibration parameter values.
  • groupmod - Add/delete group parameters from multigroup data.
  • hstephem - Convert ST orbit ephemeris file to an STSDAS table.
  • mkmultispec - Combine wavelength and data with the MULTISPEC MWCS.
  • mkweight - Make a simple weighting file for use in task specalign.
  • north - Print the position angles of images.
  • poffsets - Find pixel offsets using cross-correlation.
  • pprofile - Plot or print radial profile or encircled energy.
  • putcal - Place parameter values from a calibration pset into data files
  • rapidlook - Display a 1-D multigroup image as a 2-D image.
  • rcombine - Average or sum rapid-readout data with propagation of errors.
  • rdssa - Convert the PDB SVDF.DAT file into an SDAS table.
  • resample - Resample calibrated fluxes to a linear wavelength scale.
  • specalign - Combine spectra such as FP-SPLIT Observations.
  • vac2air - Convert wavelength scales from vacuum to air.

  • (Type "help ctools option=sysdoc" for detailed information about the
  • `ctools' package.)
